amendment.description: Amendment prohibits any funding for the planning or development of the California State Route 710 Freeway extension project through South Pasadena, California.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit any funding for the planning or development of the California State Route 710 Freeway extension project through South Pasadena, California.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Rogan amendment was withdrawn.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rogan amendment (A003) Agreed to by recorded vote: 241 - 190 (Roll no. 249).
